description: Angular component 'FoliosListComponent' that displays a list of analyst's folios with features like sorting, navigation, and empty state handling.

classes.name: FoliosListComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for listing and managing folios for analysts, including UI elements for creating new folios and sorting existing ones.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component, triggering data load.

methods.name: goNew
methods.description: Navigates to the folio creation page, with SSR-safe fallback.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting of folios by the selected key.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Calls the FolioService to fetch list of folios and triggers sorting.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the folios array based on the current sort key.

ctags.name: Folio
ctags.pattern: /^    const key = this.sortKey as keyof Folio;$/

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^      const g = globalThis as unknown as { location?: { href: string } };$/

ctags.name: key
ctags.pattern: /^    const key = this.sortKey as keyof Folio;$/
